data.summary: COPDAbout COPDSymptoms of COPD include frequent coughing or wheezing, excess phlegm, and shortness of breath.May 14, 2024COPD Resources for Patients and Their FamiliesVarious COPD resources including general information and more.May 14, 2024Public Health ProfessionalsCOPD Resources for Health ProfessionalsTo provide resources for healthcare professionalsMay 14, 2024National Trends in COPDDescribe national trends on COPD prevalence and mortalityMay 14, 2024State Estimates of COPDTo provide state-level estimates for COPD prevalence and mortalityMay 14, 2024Adults Diagnosed with COPD by CountyTo provide county-level estimates for COPDMay 14, 2024
